FastReport.Data.Couchbase.Description: Represents a connection to Couchbase server for FastReport.Net.

FastReport.Data.Firebird.Description: Represents a connection to Firebird data for FastReport.Net.

FastReport.Data.Json.Description: Represents a connection to Json data for FastReport.Net.

FastReport.Data.MongoDB.Description: Represents a connection to MongoDB data for FastReport.Net.

FastReport.Data.MySql.Description: Represents a connection to MySql data for FastReport.Net.

FastReport.Data.OracleODPCore.Description: Represents a connection to Oracle data for FastReport.Net.

FastReport.Data.Postgres.Description: Represents a connection to Npgsql data for FastReport.Net.

FastReport.Data.RavenDB.Description: Represents a connection to RavenDB data for FastReport.Net.

FastReport.Data.SQLite.Description: Represents a connection to Sqlite data for FastReport.Net.
